cause.description:
The end goal of this cause is to live in a sustainable community within a sustainable world. In order for this to become a reality, there will need to be an effective balance between environmental, economic, and social sustainability.
Working toward this goal, successful case studies derived from experience are invaluable. The hard-learned lessons then need to be shared with an ever-growing audience to gain mass acceptance.
This process begins with a commitment to organizations like the "Alliance for Sustainable Colorado". Through their cooperative work with individuals, non-profit organizations, business, and government they have proven a working model that can be adopted more broadly.
Please join me in showing your support for best practices in real-world sustainable development.
1. Protect and preserve the integrity of the biosphere.
2. Respect the natural environment and the limits of the planet’s finite resources.
3. Build an effective balance between environmental, economic, and social sustainability.
cause.mission: Support sustainable development by example and through education.
cause.name: Sustainable World Alliance
